name: Give me WIFI!
description:
Made during GGJ2018 at the Singapore site.

A very old project that we decided to make with JS instead of Unity because we wanted to try something new. luckily the final project's quality turns out "acceptable" ?

The game's level 2 and 3 are broken so please try level 1 first, source code is attached in case anyone wants to fix and play level 2 and 3.
